title: Need feedback/tips on my montage

embed.description: ► Enjoyed the video? Leave a LIKE to support me! This is my first ever League of Legends montage, the clips may not be spectacular and same goes for the editing, but i'm new to Vegas and I had a muck around with a few Video FX things.

body: Hey guys, I recently (two days ago) made my first ever montage, I hardly ever use Sony Vegas and it was practically my first time editing something fully with it. I was curious if you guys could give me some opinions/feedback on what I could improve on in future montages? I would really appreciate any comments you guys have to share! Thank you!

replies.body:
It's a good montage overall!
Just one thing I want to point-out is the music,instead of using those rock-type music for montages,I recommend using music such as:
Tobu - Infectious https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ux8-EbW6DUI
K-391 -Electro House https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QllgUm19EnQ

Just to name a few.Keep in mind this is my personal preference but I really enjoy watching montages with those type of music.
Thanks, those two songs sound pretty good, i'll probably use one of them in my next montage, thanks for commenting!

Your not just confined to this type of music.

you can use any music.

Hey man, i'll write a list for you, but first i want to see thanks for sharing this with the us, i'm in the process of making a montage myself (maybe collab :P)

for your first montage i think you did really well.


* the intro i felt you could of started the music rather then just game sound then fade out and transition
* Music was good, i felt you could of sync'ed abit more to the plays.
* would prob put an outro rather then just fading out. 
* the colour overlay is quite good, i'd prob go a touch lighter tho.. and by a touch i do mean the slightest amount, this is just me. but i feel when youtube renders it you lose abit of your brightness and contract and overall sharpness. ( there is a way around this )


The montage was really good, pref ranked games over pub stomp norms. but that's personal pref and in no way should be seen as a negative thing!
we all get our content one way or another. each their own.


overall i think its good, and i look forward to seeing some quality content in the future :)


Addme if you like, would be great to chat with another person about game content :)

Peace

Hey man, thank you for the feedback, it will help for my future montages :) and yeah I do really need to sync the music with kills for it to sounds better, again, thanks for taking the time and watching it and commenting! And yeah add me on League, i'm Ironsiigma
